Sentencas: To cope effectively with the world's energy shortage and environmental pollution, a fuel cell combined with waste heat recovery technology has gradually become the best option for large ship power generation equipment.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: In this investigation, a combined system comprising a solid-oxide-fuel-cell-gas-turbine subsystem, supercritical carbon dioxide cycle, organic Rankine cycle, ammonia-water absorption refrigeration cycle, and high-pressure reverse osmosis desalination plant is introduced and analysed.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Not only the power output of the system is calculated, but also the contribution of cold energy is considered by calculating its equivalent power.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: The results illustrate that the equivalent net output and thermal efficiency of the system are 278.82 kW and 67.03%, respectively.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Compared with the solid oxide fuel cell, the power output increases by 86.35 kW and the fuel efficiency increases by 20.7%.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Additionally, the system can provide 5.95 kW of cold energy and 0.94 m(3)/h of fresh water for the crew under the condition of maximum power output.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: To summarize, the proposed novel system design can realize the combined production of cold energy, electric energy, and fresh water, and it exhibits the characteristics of high efficiency and cleanliness.
Titulo: Waste heat cascade utilisation of solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications
